name: Xenia
description: A Metroidvania in Ancient Greece. Take control of the blacksmith Ardas. Fight epic bosses, find secret rooms and treasures, spend your gold for upgrades, and choose your fate through alternative endings. All this for one purpose. To save queen Xenia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2Duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 310 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Storage: 310 MB available space
